title: Highly luminous supernovae associated with gamma-ray bursts II. The Luminous Blue Bump in the Afterglow of GRB 140506A
comment: GRB 140506A的余辉光变的一个平台可能反映了一个特殊的GRB成协超新星的存在: 更亮, 颜色更蓝.

title: Evidence of X-ray plateaus driven by the magnetar spindown winds in gamma-ray burst afterglows
comment: 从历史数据中找出了三个GRB, 它们的X射线光变曲线与磁星自旋减慢引擎模型相符合.
